decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1495PL01-1, dated 20/06/13, received 08/07/13; 1495PL01-2 rev a, dated 03/07/13, received 08/07/13; and Design & Access Statement, undated, received 18/07/13) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the outbuilding hereby permitted shall match those used, In particular the external walls shall be finished with a brick that matches (colour, face-bond, pointing and size) the brick used in the primary building on the site on the frotnage that faces Heston Road.
Condition : 4 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be used at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the use of the shop known as No. 174-176 Heston Road, Heston.
description: Erection of single storey detached outbuilding to replace two existing garages
